mapper.select: SELECT r.`index`, r.video_index, r.title, r.content, r.writer_id, u.nickname, u.password, u.email, u.name, date_format(r.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date, r.view_cnt, r.`like`, r.dislike FROM review AS r, user AS u WHERE r.writer_id = u.id

SELECT r.`index`, r.video_index, r.title, r.content, r.writer_id, u.nickname, u.password, u.email, u.name, date_format(r.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date, r.view_cnt, r.`like`, r.dislike FROM review AS r, user AS u WHERE `index` = #{reviewIndex} AND r.writer_id = u.id

SELECT r.`index`, r.video_index, r.title, r.content, u.nickname AS 'writer_id', date_format(r.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date, r.view_cnt, r.`like`, r.dislike FROM review AS r, user AS u WHERE `video_index` = #{videoIndex} AND r.writer_id = u.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (video_index, title, content, writer_id, reg_date) VALUES (${videoIndex}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writerId}, #{regDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET dislike = dislike + 1 WHERE `index` = #{index}
